title: Trump Fires Lt. Col. Vindman from NSC in Retaliation for Impeachment Testimony
summary: Army Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman, the Ukraine expert on the National Security Council who testified in Trump's impeachment proceedings, is escorted out of the White House and removed from his NSC position. Trump calls Vindman "very insubordinate" and claims he had "problems with judgment, adhering to the chain of command and leaking information." The firing occurs just two days after Trump's Senate acquittal, demonstrating systematic retaliation against military officers who provide truthful testimony to Congress. Vindman's twin brother, also an NSC lawyer, is simultaneously dismissed despite not testifying, showing the administration's willingness to punish military families for constitutional duty.
